short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalist new tab replacement with hand-picked wallpapers strictly for BMW fans ;)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces the "new tab" page (the page you see when you click the "new tab" button) with minimalist version which comes with only one small menu on the top-left corner (keeping the main functionality of the original New Tab page).

The main goal was to get rid of all useless "bells and whistles" (widgets, thumbnails, search boxes etc.) and show big, high-quality wallpaper instead.

The most important feature of the original new tab is, however, preserved: the list of your most visited pages. We just put it in the top-left menu and removed the big thumbnails to make room for the wallpaper.

The main features "en brief":

* 65 hand-picked high quality images
* Randomly selected wallpaper for each new tab
* Links to most visited, bookmarks, history and more (you can choose which one to show/hide)
* Clean and simple interface -- just the wallpaper and the small menu on top (if you decide to keep it)
* Works offline (no internet required, images are part of the extension so it will not eat your bandwidth)

Permissions:

* Replace the page you see when opening a new tab (we need this permission because we have to change the current new tab page and start showing the wallpapers instead)
* Read the list of your most visited pages (required in order to show you the "Most Visited" menu)
